markdown.markdown:
Phenology, topography, competition, soil, temperature and drought
data were joined into one data data set. All time series were cut to the
length of either

-   the latest observer contract if the same tree was observed since the
    start
-   the approximate observation start of the group/individual if the
    tree had to be changed
-   10 years before the start of observation if the same tree was taken
    over from the previous observer

Time series that are too short (e.g. GON_TC) or not precise enough (e.g.
RGS_FS) were removed. In the case of LID_LD only one observation year is
available right now (currently confirming with the observer). In the
case of DIH the trees of the previous observer were sampled.

```{r load-data, include=FALSE}
location <- paste0(getwd())
source(paste0("../00_helpers/setup.R")) #common libraries and custom functions
source(paste0("../00_helpers/species_and_phases.R"))

phenology <- readRDS(paste0(path_own_data, "/input_phenology.rds"))
phenology_wide <- readRDS(paste0(path_own_data, "/input_phenology_wide.rds"))

photoperiod <- readRDS(paste0(path_own_data, "/input_photoperiod.rds"))
topography <- readRDS(paste0(path_own_data, "/input_topography.rds"))
competition <- readRDS(paste0(path_own_data, "/input_competition.rds"))
sample_data <- readRDS(paste0(path_own_data, "/sample_data.rds"))
drought_monthly <- readRDS(paste0(path_own_data, "/input_drought.rds")) %>% filter(if_all(everything(), ~ !is.na(.)))
drought_daily <- readRDS(paste0(path_own_data, "/input_drought_daily.rds")) %>% filter(if_all(everything(), ~ !is.na(.)))
temperature <- readRDS(paste0(path_own_data, "/input_temperature_unfolding.rds"))
soil <- readRDS(paste0(path_own_data, "/input_soil.rds"))
```

```{r join-subset, echo=TRUE, filename="Join all subsets."}
DOY_ROUND <- 7

model_input <- sample_data %>%
  dplyr::select(SAMPLE_CODE, OBSERVATION_TYPE,
         #stand structure
         SOCIAL_SITUATION, LAND_USE, EDGE_DIST, EDGE_DIST_IMPUTED, TREE_HEIGHT,
         #soil
         ROOT_AREA_ARTIFICIALLY_LIMITED, HUMUS_TYPE, HOLE_DEPTH_MAX) %>%
  #topography
  left_join(topography %>% select(SAMPLE_CODE, TREE_ELEVATION, SLOPE_ASPECT, SLOPE_ASPECT_F, SLOPE_ASPECT_EW, SLOPE_ASPECT_NS, SLOPE_ASPECT_HL, SLOPE_INCLINATION_DEG, RELIEF), by="SAMPLE_CODE") %>% 
  #competition
  left_join(competition, by="SAMPLE_CODE") %>%
  # soil
  left_join(soil, by="SAMPLE_CODE")

saveRDS(model_input, paste0(path_own_data, "/sample_data_processed.rds"))

model_input <- model_input %>%
  #all phases long
  left_join(phenology %>% 
              dplyr::select(SAMPLE_CODE, OBSERVER, year, doy) %>%
              #pivot_wider(names_from=PHASE, values_from=doy) %>%
              mutate(DOY_DATE = as.Date(doy),
                     DOY_ROUNDED = if_else(
                       day(DOY_DATE) <= DOY_ROUND,
                       floor_date(DOY_DATE, unit = "month")- months(1),
                       DOY_DATE),
                     DOY_DATE_ROUNDED = as.numeric(format(DOY_ROUNDED, "%m"))), #move this to data formatting if possible
            by = "SAMPLE_CODE") %>%
  #leaf unfolding wide
  left_join(phenology_wide %>% select(-leaf_colouring_50_percent), by=c("SAMPLE_CODE", "year")) %>%
  #drought monthly
  left_join(drought_monthly, by = c("SAMPLE_CODE", "year"="year", "DOY_DATE_ROUNDED" = "month")) %>%
  #drought daily
  left_join(drought_daily, by = c("SAMPLE_CODE", "year", "doy" = "DATE_NUMBER")) %>%
  #temperature
  inner_join(temperature,
            by=c("SAMPLE_CODE", "year", "doy")) %>%
  #photoperiod
  left_join(photoperiod %>%
              dplyr::select(DOY, PHOTOPERIOD),
            by=c("doy"="DOY")) %>%
  #exlude bad time series
  filter(SAMPLE_CODE !="GON_TC") %>%
  filter(SAMPLE_CODE !="LID_LD") %>%
  mutate(METEO_ID = factor(METEO_ID),
         RELIEF = gsub(" ", "", as.character(RELIEF)),
         RELIEF = factor(RELIEF),
         SOCIAL_SITUATION = gsub(" ", "", as.character(SOCIAL_SITUATION)),
         SOCIAL_SITUATION = factor(SOCIAL_SITUATION),
         EDGE_DIST_IMPUTED = factor(EDGE_DIST_IMPUTED),
         OBSERVER = factor(OBSERVER),
         PHASE = case_when(PHASE %like% "unfold" ~ "leaf unfolding",
                           TRUE ~PHASE)) %>%
  filter(SPECIES_SHORT!="CS") %>% 
  ungroup()

model_input_scaled <- model_input %>%
  mutate_if(is.numeric, scale)

model_input_complete <- model_input %>%
  select (SPECIES_SHORT, METEO_ID, SAMPLE_CODE, doy, year, leaf_unfolding_50_percent, LEAF_COLOURING_LAG,
          #temperature
          contains("GDD"), contains("CDD"),
          #drought
          CLIM_BALANCE1, CLIM_BALANCE6, CLIM_BALANCE12, CLIM_BALANCE_DAYSUM3, CLIM_BALANCE_DAYSUM3, CLIM_BALANCE_DAYSUM12, PET_HARG,
          #soil
          SUM_AWC_ADJUSTED_ALL,
          #topography
          SLOPE_ASPECT_F, SLOPE_ASPECT_HL, SLOPE_ASPECT_NS, SLOPE_ASPECT_EW, SLOPE_INCLINATION_DEG, RELIEF, TREE_ELEVATION,
          #stand structure
          SOCIAL_SITUATION, EDGE_DIST, EDGE_DIST_IMPUTED, TREE_HEIGHT, STAND_HEIGHT,
          OBSERVER) %>% 
  filter(complete.cases(.))
```

```{r save-output, include=FALSE}
saveRDS(model_input, paste0(path_output_data, "/model_input.rds"))
saveRDS(model_input_scaled, paste0(path_output_data, "/model_input_scaled.rds"))
saveRDS(model_input_complete, paste0(path_output_data, "/model_input_complete.rds"))
```

Missing values of tree height, cooling and warming sums were rare and were removed before the analysis. Missing values of leaf colouring lag were filtered before each model containing the parameter. Data sets are available raw as well as scaled and centered across sites for continuous explanatory parameters.

```{r create-species-specific-subsets, echo=TRUE, filename="Create species specific subsets."}
# Load data
data_raw <- readRDS(paste0(path_own_data, "/output_data/model_input.rds"))

data <- data_raw %>%
  select (SPECIES_SHORT, METEO_ID, SAMPLE_CODE, doy, year, leaf_unfolding_50_percent, LEAF_COLOURING_LAG,
          #temperature
          contains("GDD"), contains("CDD"),
          #drought
          CLIM_BALANCE1, CLIM_BALANCE6, CLIM_BALANCE12, CLIM_BALANCE_DAYSUM3, CLIM_BALANCE_DAYSUM6, CLIM_BALANCE_DAYSUM12,
          #soil
          SUM_AWC_ADJUSTED_ALL,
          #topography
          SLOPE_ASPECT_F, SLOPE_ASPECT_HL, SLOPE_INCLINATION_DEG, RELIEF, TREE_ELEVATION,
          #stand structure
          SOCIAL_SITUATION, EDGE_DIST, EDGE_DIST_IMPUTED, TREE_HEIGHT, STAND_HEIGHT)

# Extract NA
na <- data %>%
  filter(if_any(everything(), is.na)) %>%
  select(METEO_ID, SPECIES_SHORT, year, where(~ any(is.na(.))))
saveRDS(na, paste0(path_output_data, "/data_na.rds"))

# Filter complete cases
data_complete <- data %>%
  filter(complete.cases(select(., -LEAF_COLOURING_LAG)))
  
# Create and save species specific unscaled data sets
for(species in species_list){
  for(phase in phase_list){
    species_data <- data_complete %>%
      filter(SPECIES_SHORT == species)
    saveRDS(species_data, paste0(path_output_data, "/data_unscaled_", species, "_", gsub(" ", "_", phase), ".rds"))
    saveRDS(species_data, paste0(location, "/100_publication/own_data/data_unscaled_", species, "_", gsub(" ", "_", phase), ".rds")) # save for publication
  }
}

# Create and save species specific centered and scaled data sets
for(species in species_list){
  for(phase in phase_list){
      
    species_data <- data_complete %>%
      filter(SPECIES_SHORT == species) %>%
  #mutate(across(where(is.numeric) & !all_of(c("doy", "year")), ~ as.numeric(scale(.x)))) # optional change to prevent matrix naming
      mutate(across(where(is.numeric) & !all_of(c("doy","year")), scale)) #scale all numeric columns but day of year

    saveRDS(species_data, paste0(path_output_data, "/data_scaled_", species, "_", gsub(" ", "_", phase), ".rds"))
    
    # Create scale object
    # more info here: https://stats.stackexchange.com/questions/209784/rescale-predictions-of-regression-model-fitted-on-scaled-predictors
    scale_object <- data_complete %>%
      filter(SPECIES_SHORT == species) %>%
      mutate(across(where(is.numeric), ~ scale(.x), .names = "{.col}")) %>%
      reframe(across(where(is.numeric), ~ list(scale = attr(.x, "scaled:scale"), center = attr(.x, "scaled:center")))) %>% 
      mutate(scale = case_when(row_number() %% 2 == 0 ~ "center",
                               TRUE ~ "scale"
                               )) %>%
      pivot_longer(cols=1:(ncol(.) - 1), names_to = "variable", values_to = "scale_info") %>%
      pivot_wider(everything(), names_from = scale, values_from = scale_info) %>%
      mutate(across(c(scale, center), unlist)) %>%
      split(.$variable)

    saveRDS(scale_object, paste0(path_output_data, "/scale_list_", species, "_", gsub(" ", "_", phase), ".rds"))
  }
}
```
markdown.srcMarkdownNoYaml:
# Data preparation

Phenology, topography, competition, soil, temperature and drought
data were joined into one data data set. All time series were cut to the
length of either

-   the latest observer contract if the same tree was observed since the
    start
-   the approximate observation start of the group/individual if the
    tree had to be changed
-   10 years before the start of observation if the same tree was taken
    over from the previous observer

Time series that are too short (e.g. GON_TC) or not precise enough (e.g.
RGS_FS) were removed. In the case of LID_LD only one observation year is
available right now (currently confirming with the observer). In the
case of DIH the trees of the previous observer were sampled.

```{r load-data, include=FALSE}
location <- paste0(getwd())
source(paste0("../00_helpers/setup.R")) #common libraries and custom functions
source(paste0("../00_helpers/species_and_phases.R"))

phenology <- readRDS(paste0(path_own_data, "/input_phenology.rds"))
phenology_wide <- readRDS(paste0(path_own_data, "/input_phenology_wide.rds"))

photoperiod <- readRDS(paste0(path_own_data, "/input_photoperiod.rds"))
topography <- readRDS(paste0(path_own_data, "/input_topography.rds"))
competition <- readRDS(paste0(path_own_data, "/input_competition.rds"))
sample_data <- readRDS(paste0(path_own_data, "/sample_data.rds"))
drought_monthly <- readRDS(paste0(path_own_data, "/input_drought.rds")) %>% filter(if_all(everything(), ~ !is.na(.)))
drought_daily <- readRDS(paste0(path_own_data, "/input_drought_daily.rds")) %>% filter(if_all(everything(), ~ !is.na(.)))
temperature <- readRDS(paste0(path_own_data, "/input_temperature_unfolding.rds"))
soil <- readRDS(paste0(path_own_data, "/input_soil.rds"))
```

```{r join-subset, echo=TRUE, filename="Join all subsets."}
DOY_ROUND <- 7

model_input <- sample_data %>%
  dplyr::select(SAMPLE_CODE, OBSERVATION_TYPE,
         #stand structure
         SOCIAL_SITUATION, LAND_USE, EDGE_DIST, EDGE_DIST_IMPUTED, TREE_HEIGHT,
         #soil
         ROOT_AREA_ARTIFICIALLY_LIMITED, HUMUS_TYPE, HOLE_DEPTH_MAX) %>%
  #topography
  left_join(topography %>% select(SAMPLE_CODE, TREE_ELEVATION, SLOPE_ASPECT, SLOPE_ASPECT_F, SLOPE_ASPECT_EW, SLOPE_ASPECT_NS, SLOPE_ASPECT_HL, SLOPE_INCLINATION_DEG, RELIEF), by="SAMPLE_CODE") %>% 
  #competition
  left_join(competition, by="SAMPLE_CODE") %>%
  # soil
  left_join(soil, by="SAMPLE_CODE")

saveRDS(model_input, paste0(path_own_data, "/sample_data_processed.rds"))

model_input <- model_input %>%
  #all phases long
  left_join(phenology %>% 
              dplyr::select(SAMPLE_CODE, OBSERVER, year, doy) %>%
              #pivot_wider(names_from=PHASE, values_from=doy) %>%
              mutate(DOY_DATE = as.Date(doy),
                     DOY_ROUNDED = if_else(
                       day(DOY_DATE) <= DOY_ROUND,
                       floor_date(DOY_DATE, unit = "month")- months(1),
                       DOY_DATE),
                     DOY_DATE_ROUNDED = as.numeric(format(DOY_ROUNDED, "%m"))), #move this to data formatting if possible
            by = "SAMPLE_CODE") %>%
  #leaf unfolding wide
  left_join(phenology_wide %>% select(-leaf_colouring_50_percent), by=c("SAMPLE_CODE", "year")) %>%
  #drought monthly
  left_join(drought_monthly, by = c("SAMPLE_CODE", "year"="year", "DOY_DATE_ROUNDED" = "month")) %>%
  #drought daily
  left_join(drought_daily, by = c("SAMPLE_CODE", "year", "doy" = "DATE_NUMBER")) %>%
  #temperature
  inner_join(temperature,
            by=c("SAMPLE_CODE", "year", "doy")) %>%
  #photoperiod
  left_join(photoperiod %>%
              dplyr::select(DOY, PHOTOPERIOD),
            by=c("doy"="DOY")) %>%
  #exlude bad time series
  filter(SAMPLE_CODE !="GON_TC") %>%
  filter(SAMPLE_CODE !="LID_LD") %>%
  mutate(METEO_ID = factor(METEO_ID),
         RELIEF = gsub(" ", "", as.character(RELIEF)),
         RELIEF = factor(RELIEF),
         SOCIAL_SITUATION = gsub(" ", "", as.character(SOCIAL_SITUATION)),
         SOCIAL_SITUATION = factor(SOCIAL_SITUATION),
         EDGE_DIST_IMPUTED = factor(EDGE_DIST_IMPUTED),
         OBSERVER = factor(OBSERVER),
         PHASE = case_when(PHASE %like% "unfold" ~ "leaf unfolding",
                           TRUE ~PHASE)) %>%
  filter(SPECIES_SHORT!="CS") %>% 
  ungroup()

model_input_scaled <- model_input %>%
  mutate_if(is.numeric, scale)

model_input_complete <- model_input %>%
  select (SPECIES_SHORT, METEO_ID, SAMPLE_CODE, doy, year, leaf_unfolding_50_percent, LEAF_COLOURING_LAG,
          #temperature
          contains("GDD"), contains("CDD"),
          #drought
          CLIM_BALANCE1, CLIM_BALANCE6, CLIM_BALANCE12, CLIM_BALANCE_DAYSUM3, CLIM_BALANCE_DAYSUM3, CLIM_BALANCE_DAYSUM12, PET_HARG,
          #soil
          SUM_AWC_ADJUSTED_ALL,
          #topography
          SLOPE_ASPECT_F, SLOPE_ASPECT_HL, SLOPE_ASPECT_NS, SLOPE_ASPECT_EW, SLOPE_INCLINATION_DEG, RELIEF, TREE_ELEVATION,
          #stand structure
          SOCIAL_SITUATION, EDGE_DIST, EDGE_DIST_IMPUTED, TREE_HEIGHT, STAND_HEIGHT,
          OBSERVER) %>% 
  filter(complete.cases(.))
```

```{r save-output, include=FALSE}
saveRDS(model_input, paste0(path_output_data, "/model_input.rds"))
saveRDS(model_input_scaled, paste0(path_output_data, "/model_input_scaled.rds"))
saveRDS(model_input_complete, paste0(path_output_data, "/model_input_complete.rds"))
```

Missing values of tree height, cooling and warming sums were rare and were removed before the analysis. Missing values of leaf colouring lag were filtered before each model containing the parameter. Data sets are available raw as well as scaled and centered across sites for continuous explanatory parameters.

```{r create-species-specific-subsets, echo=TRUE, filename="Create species specific subsets."}
# Load data
data_raw <- readRDS(paste0(path_own_data, "/output_data/model_input.rds"))

data <- data_raw %>%
  select (SPECIES_SHORT, METEO_ID, SAMPLE_CODE, doy, year, leaf_unfolding_50_percent, LEAF_COLOURING_LAG,
          #temperature
          contains("GDD"), contains("CDD"),
          #drought
          CLIM_BALANCE1, CLIM_BALANCE6, CLIM_BALANCE12, CLIM_BALANCE_DAYSUM3, CLIM_BALANCE_DAYSUM6, CLIM_BALANCE_DAYSUM12,
          #soil
          SUM_AWC_ADJUSTED_ALL,
          #topography
          SLOPE_ASPECT_F, SLOPE_ASPECT_HL, SLOPE_INCLINATION_DEG, RELIEF, TREE_ELEVATION,
          #stand structure
          SOCIAL_SITUATION, EDGE_DIST, EDGE_DIST_IMPUTED, TREE_HEIGHT, STAND_HEIGHT)

# Extract NA
na <- data %>%
  filter(if_any(everything(), is.na)) %>%
  select(METEO_ID, SPECIES_SHORT, year, where(~ any(is.na(.))))
saveRDS(na, paste0(path_output_data, "/data_na.rds"))

# Filter complete cases
data_complete <- data %>%
  filter(complete.cases(select(., -LEAF_COLOURING_LAG)))
  
# Create and save species specific unscaled data sets
for(species in species_list){
  for(phase in phase_list){
    species_data <- data_complete %>%
      filter(SPECIES_SHORT == species)
    saveRDS(species_data, paste0(path_output_data, "/data_unscaled_", species, "_", gsub(" ", "_", phase), ".rds"))
    saveRDS(species_data, paste0(location, "/100_publication/own_data/data_unscaled_", species, "_", gsub(" ", "_", phase), ".rds")) # save for publication
  }
}

# Create and save species specific centered and scaled data sets
for(species in species_list){
  for(phase in phase_list){
      
    species_data <- data_complete %>%
      filter(SPECIES_SHORT == species) %>%
  #mutate(across(where(is.numeric) & !all_of(c("doy", "year")), ~ as.numeric(scale(.x)))) # optional change to prevent matrix naming
      mutate(across(where(is.numeric) & !all_of(c("doy","year")), scale)) #scale all numeric columns but day of year

    saveRDS(species_data, paste0(path_output_data, "/data_scaled_", species, "_", gsub(" ", "_", phase), ".rds"))
    
    # Create scale object
    # more info here: https://stats.stackexchange.com/questions/209784/rescale-predictions-of-regression-model-fitted-on-scaled-predictors
    scale_object <- data_complete %>%
      filter(SPECIES_SHORT == species) %>%
      mutate(across(where(is.numeric), ~ scale(.x), .names = "{.col}")) %>%
      reframe(across(where(is.numeric), ~ list(scale = attr(.x, "scaled:scale"), center = attr(.x, "scaled:center")))) %>% 
      mutate(scale = case_when(row_number() %% 2 == 0 ~ "center",
                               TRUE ~ "scale"
                               )) %>%
      pivot_longer(cols=1:(ncol(.) - 1), names_to = "variable", values_to = "scale_info") %>%
      pivot_wider(everything(), names_from = scale, values_from = scale_info) %>%
      mutate(across(c(scale, center), unlist)) %>%
      split(.$variable)

    saveRDS(scale_object, paste0(path_output_data, "/scale_list_", species, "_", gsub(" ", "_", phase), ".rds"))
  }
}
```
